vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Wilbow-Timberlawn, LLC, of approximately four acres of land located near the intersection of Samuell Boulevard and Grove Hill Road for the 4600 Samuell Boulevard Future Park Project - Not to exceed $1,207,600.86 ($1,200,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $7,600.86) - Financing: Equity Revitalization Capital Fund ($107,600.86) and General Fund ($1,100,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize acquisition from Wilbow-Timberlawn, LLC, of approximately four acres of land located near the intersection of Samuell Boulevard and Grove Hill Road for the 4600 Samuell Boulevard Future Park Project - Not to exceed $1,207,600.86 ($1,200,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $7,600.86) - Financing: Equity Revitalization Capital Fund ($107,600.86) and General Fund ($1,100,000.00)
